flawed_nl_solution:
After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=45>>45 biscuits.
After his mother gave him 15 biscuits, Randy has 45 + 15 = <<45+15=58>>58 biscuits.
After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 58 - 20 = <<58-20=38>>38 biscuits.
#### 38

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 58. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
